from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from datetime import datetime

print("OpenLineage Integration Test Starting...")

# Initialize Spark
spark = SparkSession.builder \
    .appName("openlineage_integration_test") \
    .getOrCreate()

# Define test paths
timestamp = datetime.now().strftime('%Y%m%d_%H%M%S')
input_path = "abfss://data@pinsstodwdevuksl92q7c.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/test_ol/input.parquet"
output_path = f"abfss://data@pinsstodwdevuksl92q7c.dfs.core.windows.net/processed/test_ol/output_{timestamp}.parquet"

# Create test data
print(" Creating test data...")
data = [
    (1, "Alice", "Engineering", 75000),
    (2, "Bob", "Sales", 65000),
    (3, "Charlie", "Engineering", 80000),
    (4, "Diana", "Marketing", 70000),
    (5, "Eve", "Engineering", 85000)
]
columns = ["id", "name", "department", "salary"]

df = spark.createDataFrame(data, columns)

# Perform transformation
print(" Performing transformations...")
df_filtered = df.filter(df.department == "Engineering") \
                .select("id", "name", "salary") \
                .withColumn("salary_gbp", df.salary * 0.79)  # Example transformation

# Show sample
print("ðŸ“‹ Sample output:")
df_filtered.show()

# Write output (triggers OpenLineage events)
print(f" Writing output to: {output_path}")
df_filtered.write.mode("overwrite").parquet(output_path)

print(" Test completed successfully!")
print(f" OpenLineage events should have been sent to: https://pins-oljsonreceiver-odw-dev-uks.azurewebsites.net")
print(f" Check Purview for lineage: search for 'openlineage_integration_test'")
